message.content:
I need to identify the costs incurred to secure customer orders and deliver goods and services to customers.

Looking at the income statement, I need to find line items related to selling and delivering products/services to customers. In income statements, "Selling Expenses" typically represents costs related to marketing, sales commissions, advertising, and other costs directly related to securing customer orders.

From the income statement provided, I can see:
- "Selling Expenses" with a value of 360961.15

This line item represents the costs incurred to secure customer orders and deliver goods/services to customers.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '360961.15'}}
```
